# Region Discoveries

![Showcase](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/62117829/408155803-eeb7e872-c69e-4a3d-85ec-27beed76241b.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..NRiXVGKEHfI8KqNJcybYMIBO9GjpZvCr1j5wnKhxQFw)

# How it works: 
_Depends on World Guard._
By utilsing listeners for Region enter and leave events, a customizable minimessage formatted message will be displayed to the player.
